game.name: SORROW: Rise of Divinity
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An open-world action survival game combining fast-paced battle royale, competitive deathmatches, trophy hunting, and intense missions—where strategy and skill determine your fate.
